data.text:
Hi All,

One of our application connects to selectica servers to get data in form of XML files.

While connecting to selectica,we are getting following error,I am not sure how selectica connects to the Tibco:

The lines marked in red are not clear to us.Please throw some light on what is the meaning of MAC here and and what can be the probable error here.

[TibjmsSSL]: reading trusted certificate(s) from file ‘/opt/httpd/root/apps/src/conf/ca.crt.pem’, format=PEM

[TibjmsSSL]: adding trusted certificate [CertCN=ITG Application CA, IssuerCN=ITG Application CA]

[TibjmsSSL]: reading client identity from file ‘/opt/httpd/root/apps/src/conf/xxsrc.p12’, format=PKCS12

[TibjmsSSL]: reading client identity from PKCS12 input stream

java.io.IOException: Unable to verify MAC.

at com.ibm.crypto.provider.PKCS12KeyStore.engineLoad(Unknown Source)

at java.security.KeyStore.load(KeyStore.java:695)

at com.tibco.security.impl.ibm.e.init(IdentityImpl.java)

at com.tibco.security.IdentityFactory.createIdentity(IdentityFactory.java:69)

at com.tibco.tibjms.TibjmsSSL._identityFromStore(TibjmsSSL.java:2761)

at com.tibco.tibjms.TibjmsSSL.createIdentity(TibjmsSSL.java:2685)

at com.tibco.tibjms.TibjmsxLinkSSL._initSSL(TibjmsxLinkSSL.java:319)

at com.tibco.tibjms.TibjmsxLinkSSL.connect(TibjmsxLinkSSL.java:378)

at com.tibco.tibjms.TibjmsConnection._create(TibjmsConnection.java:671)

at com.tibco.tibjms.TibjmsConnection.

Hi All

Please help us it is very high priority issue…

While looking into the log it seems there is authentication failure for

certificate thus the MAC address i.e. “Physical Address” of the machine,

(1) The exception “Unable to verify MAC” is raised in some cases where it is

failing authentication.

(2) Hence JavaAPIManager is refusing the connection.

(3) Hence no session is generated.

Please find below the exception log for the same.

[9/20/06 3:05:42:308 PDT] 4d9dd4ca SystemErr R [TibjmsSSL]: reading

trusted certificate(s) from file ‘/opt/httpd/root/apps/src/conf/ca.crt.pem’,

format=PEM

[9/20/06 3:05:42:321 PDT] 4d9dd4ca SystemErr R [TibjmsSSL]: adding

trusted certificate [CertCN=ITG Application CA, IssuerCN=ITG Application CA]

[9/20/06 3:05:42:321 PDT] 4d9dd4ca SystemErr R [TibjmsSSL]: reading

client identity from file ‘/opt/httpd/root/apps/src/conf/xxsrc.p12’,

format=PKCS12

[9/20/06 3:05:42:332 PDT] 4d9dd4ca SystemErr R [TibjmsSSL]: reading

client identity from PKCS12 input stream

[9/20/06 3:05:42:333 PDT] 4d9dd4ca SystemErr R java.io.IOException:

Unable to verify MAC.

[9/20/06 3:05:42:333 PDT] 4d9dd4ca SystemErr R at

com.ibm.crypto.provider.PKCS12KeyStore.engineLoad(Unknown Source)

[9/20/06 3:05:42:333 PDT] 4d9dd4ca SystemErr R at

java.security.KeyStore.load(KeyStore.java:695)

[9/20/06 3:05:42:333 PDT] 4d9dd4ca SystemErr R at

com.tibco.security.impl.ibm.e.init(IdentityImpl.java)

[9/20/06 3:05:42:333 PDT] 4d9dd4ca SystemErr R at

com.tibco.security.IdentityFactory.createIdentity(IdentityFactory.java:69)

[9/20/06 3:05:42:333 PDT] 4d9dd4ca SystemErr R at

com.tibco.tibjms.TibjmsSSL._identityFromStore(TibjmsSSL.java:2761

[9/20/06 3:05:42:338 PDT] 4d9dd4ca SystemErr R

com.selectica.javaapi.CxJavaAPIException: Cannot connect to manager.

[9/20/06 3:05:42:340 PDT] 4d9dd4ca SystemErr R

com.selectica.server.framework.CxInitializationException: Null session ID

specified.

–Amit
